lines.text: Example: As time increases, the speed of the object increases
Measures how spread out data is from its mean (average)

secText:
Lesson:
1. Create a [OBJ:expsec_c363:scatter plot] using data and identify the independent and dependent variables.
2. Draw and analyze a [OBJ:expsec_c364:trend line].
3. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_c36422:standard deviation].
4. Calculate [OBJ:expsec_c361534:regression] and use the coefficient of determination to analyze the graph.

Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_scatter_plots:Scatter Plots], [OBJ:sum_trend_lines_and_correlation:Trend Lines and Correlation], [OBJ:sum_standard_deviation:Standard Deviation], [OBJ:sum_regression:Linear Regression]
